title: Shapiro Defeats Mastriano for Pennsylvania Governor
description: Josh Shapiro, a Democrat and the state attorney general, defeated Doug Mastriano, who was central to trying to overturn Pennsylvania’s 2020 election results.
dc:creator: Katie Glueck

media:content.media:credit: Kriston Jae Bethel for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Josh Shapiro, Pennsylvania’s attorney general, positioned himself as a moderate Democrat focused on the economy, public safety, abortion rights and democracy protections.
